definition: value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty

sentences.english: So there's plenty of potential to value it by other means.
sentences.chinese: 所以用其他方法给黄金估值具有很大的潜力。
风险估值走低，事情趋于平衡。

sentences.english: The most important factor by far in high valuations is public policy.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止在市场高估值上起重要作用的是国家政策。

sentences.english: Many of those companies deserve high valuations, but not all of them.
sentences.chinese: 这些公司多数估值颇高，但也并非全部如此。

sentences.english: The USA has zero influence in the role of recalculating the Yuan value.
sentences.chinese: 美国对人民币的重新估值毫无影响。

sentences.english: That extended period of time is the sandbar that sinks ships.
sentences.chinese: 这种过分估值的时期就是让船沉没的沙洲。

sentences.english: The unified optimal and steady-state white noise and quasi-white noise estimators are presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了统一的最优和稳态白噪声和拟白噪声估值器。

sentences.english: Many Americans think that an RMB reval (sic) would save the US.
sentences.chinese: 许多美国人认为人民币重新估值可以挽救美国。

sentences.english: All of this requires accurate valuations.
sentences.chinese: 这一切都依赖于精确的估值。

sentences.english: The following figure shows the calculation for the arithmetic mean for each of the four valuation metrics.
sentences.chinese: 下面的数据显示了四个估值的算术平均值。

sentences.english: Estimates of catastrophic spending from the two measures were also compared.
sentences.chinese: 还要比较两个指标的大病治疗开支估值。

sentences.english: This provision is meant to protect investors in the event of a down round.
sentences.chinese: 这个条款是为了在估值较低的一轮融资中保护投资人。

sentences.english: Americans think that RMB reval could save the US.
sentences.chinese: 美国人认为人民币重新估值可以拯救美国。

sentences.english: Some male solicits Gao Guan saying that estimate value disorder, 10 time of market profits also possible high.
sentences.chinese: 有公募高管称，估值紊乱，10倍市盈率也可能高。

sentences.english: Gross, as opposed to net, is “the rogue word” in Gross Domestic Product, he says.
sentences.chinese: 毛估值与净值相反，是GDP的“劣词”，他说。

sentences.english: The accuracy of these estimators is studied meanwhile.
sentences.chinese: 对于估值的精度同时进行了讨论。

definition: achievement/accomplishment/(in more recent usage) performance (of a business, employee etc)/results
merger and acquisition (M and A)/acquisition/to take over
